Prerequisite: Open only to 3rd and 4th year Environmental Studies majors, all of whom must take the course in either Sem One or Sem Two of AY2017-18
ModuleDescription: This seminar in an applied and collaborative problem-solving course that reproduced the dynamics of an innovative environmental-consulting firm while enhancing the ability of students to effectively contribute to multi-disciplinary research teams. The module is required of all students majoring in environmental studies, and is open only to those students.
